Material used.Description: Fibroblasts derived from an affected individual were used.

Readout description.Result Description: *LAMA2* mRNA levels were approximately 60% reduced in fibroblasts from the affected individual compared to controls.

Biological replicates.Description: The study used a cohort of patients, suggesting multiple biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: The number of technical replicates was not specified.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type *LAMA2* cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control was specified in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student’s t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal *LAMA2* mRNA expression levels in fibroblasts.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant decrease in *LAMA2* mRNA levels compared to controls.

Material used.Description: Fibroblasts derived from an affected individual were used.

Readout description.Result Description: LAMA2 protein levels showed a corresponding decrease in fibroblasts from the affected individual.

Biological replicates.Description: The study used a cohort of patients, suggesting multiple biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: The number of technical replicates was not specified.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type *LAMA2* cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control was specified in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student’s t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal LAMA2 protein expression levels in fibroblasts.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant decrease in LAMA2 protein levels compared to controls.
